channel.title: New site, ya i want to get flamed
channel.description:
Yup I really do want you to flame me. and I am not saying that as you cant because its so good, really its crap and I want to see what you all say.
[url=http://zyberscape.com/index.php]http://zyberscape.com/index.php[/url] [url=http://zyberscape.com/front.phps]http://zyberscape.com/front.phps[/url]

item.title: New site, ya i want to get flamed
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Because I don’t get payed for doing it and + i bought the site for the “PS: Private Server”.

and the overflow is meant to be shown, if I need more room because idk if I can keep my announcements under “blank” amount of characters.

Read full topic
item.source: New site, ya i want to get flamed

item.title: New site, ya i want to get flamed
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“cumescape, post:7, topic:224425”]Ive been going out with her for 1/2 a year, so in the face?

to lazy to update the divs for center
New nav bar. done.
I love marquees.
font size is a personal fav.
font choice I never changed it?[/quote]You wanted to be flamed, don’t take it personal.

And ok, with your attitude on web design, you’re going to get no where. It’s not what you want, it’s what is suitable for people in general. ‘People’ don’t love marquees, they find them annoying and distracting. A lot of people don’t have very good eye sight, thus you have to make the font size bigger.

Anyway, you’ve basically changed everything now that I’ve mentioned so it’s looking a whole lot better… Though there’s a scroll in the Announcement box… You could take that out with CSS by using overflow-y:hidden; I think.

btw why’s there like double copyright?

Read full topic
